text: We believe communication belongs to everyone. We exist to democratize phone service. TextNow is evolving the way the world connects and that's because we're made up of people with curious minds who bring an optimistic, yet critical lens into the work we do. We're the largest provider of free phone service in the nation. And we're just getting started.
text.1: Join us in our mission to break down barriers to communication and free the flow of conversation for people everywhere.
text.2: TextNow's backend Trust and Safety team uses cutting edge technologies in a hybrid micro-services environment. Some additional prominent technologies include Kubernetes, gRPC, high throughput databases, streaming and queueing. We manage hundreds of millions of user interactions and terabytes of raw data in real-time. We are looking for software developers to expand our capabilities in harnessing this data to protect our customers. As a Senior Backend Developer, you will mentor Backend Developers, gain real world experience in building scalable, high performing systems that integrate with both heuristic and machine learning models creating an industry leading solution for affordable telecommunications.
